{"textdoc_id": "67ad47aa544c8191845a01bc95921022", "updates": [{"pattern": ".*", "replacement": "**AI-Augmented Resume for Global Marketing Automation Manager – Rithum**

**Jesse LaRose**  
[Contact Information]  

### **Executive Summary**
AI-Augmented Marketing & Revenue Operations Leader | Driving AI-Powered Automation & Efficiency

Experienced SaaS and e-commerce leader with a proven track record in **marketing automation, sales enablement, CRM optimization, and AI-driven operational efficiency**. Adept at leveraging **AI-first strategies** to automate workflows, improve lead conversion, and optimize marketing ROI. 

✅ **Why AI Makes Me the Best Candidate**  
With AI augmentation, I don’t just execute marketing automation—I **architect AI-powered systems** to replace manual processes, optimize demand generation, and scale marketing performance. My expertise in **AI-driven lead scoring, CRM automation, MarTech integrations, and predictive analytics** enables me to **automate 70-80% of traditional marketing operations**. 

---

### **Core Competencies**
- **AI-Augmented Marketing Automation** – AI-driven campaign execution, lead scoring, and audience segmentation
- **AI-Powered CRM & MarTech Optimization** – AI-assisted workflows, data enrichment, and predictive modeling
- **AI-Led Personalization & Engagement** – Dynamic, real-time AI-powered content and audience targeting
- **AI-Enhanced Compliance & GDPR Handling** – Automated regulatory monitoring and data privacy enforcement
- **AI-Driven Marketing Intelligence** – Automated insights, predictive analytics, and revenue impact assessment

---

### **Professional Experience**

#### **Senior Marketing Automation & AI Strategy Consultant | 2020-Present**
- **AI-Powered Campaign Execution** – Built AI-first email & nurture sequencing engine that automated campaign rollouts, reducing manual workload by 70%.
- **AI-Enhanced Lead Scoring & Predictive Modeling** – Implemented AI-based lead prioritization model, increasing MQL-to-SQL conversion rates by 35%.
- **Automated CRM & MarTech Workflows** – Connected Marketo, Salesforce, and Drift using AI-powered automation, reducing human intervention in marketing ops by 50%.
- **Real-Time AI-Generated Marketing Reports** – Eliminated static reporting with AI-driven dashboards that surface insights in real-time.
- **Automated GDPR Compliance Handling** – Integrated AI-powered monitoring to flag non-compliant data and auto-adjust privacy settings by region.

#### **Rithum (formerly CommerceHub) | VP, Supplier Growth | 2019-2021**
- **AI-Driven Demand Generation & ABM Personalization** – Developed AI-powered campaign sequencing that increased ABM engagement by 40%.
- **Automated Lead Routing & Scoring Models** – Designed AI workflows that dynamically scored inbound leads and optimized SDR handoff.
- **AI-Based Content Personalization & Testing** – Built a predictive AI model that automated landing page variations and A/B testing.

#### **Mirakl | Head, Drop Ship Operations | 2022**
- **AI-Driven Go-To-Market (GTM) Execution** – Spearheaded AI-powered sales enablement & automation, improving sales efficiency by 30%.
- **Automated Partner Onboarding & Sales Process** – AI-integrated CRM workflows reduced onboarding time by 50%.
- **AI-Optimized Reporting & Forecasting** – Replaced manual sales reports with AI-driven dashboards.

---

### **AI-Powered Implementation Plan for Rithum**

#### **🔹 AI Strategy Overview: Transforming Marketing Automation with AI**
Traditional marketing automation is highly manual and inefficient. AI eliminates bottlenecks by:
- **Eliminating manual campaign execution** through AI-driven scheduling and real-time adjustments.
- **Enhancing lead scoring & segmentation** with AI-powered behavioral analysis.
- **Automating CRM and MarTech workflows** to minimize human intervention.
- **Optimizing budget allocation dynamically** with AI-based performance monitoring.

#### **🔹 AI Technologies Powering This Transformation**
✅ **Marketo AI & GPT-4 for Marketing Automation** – AI-driven campaign sequencing, email generation, and nurture workflows.  
✅ **Salesforce Einstein AI** – Predictive lead scoring and automated sales-marketing handoff optimization.  
✅ **Google AutoML & TensorFlow** – AI-based content personalization and predictive targeting models.  
✅ **DataRobot & Azure AI** – AI-powered demand forecasting and audience segmentation insights.  
✅ **AI-Driven Compliance & GDPR Automation** – Automated data privacy flagging and region-based consent tracking.  
✅ **AI-Optimized Marketing Attribution Modeling** – Advanced AI-powered multi-touch attribution to optimize campaign spend.  

#### **🔹 AI Gap Analysis: Candidate Strengths vs. Role Requirements**
- **AI Capabilities:** Extensive experience in AI-driven marketing automation, lead scoring, and CRM optimization.
- **AI Implementation Feasibility:** AI enables me to optimize marketing workflows without requiring deep engineering expertise.
- **Required AI Integration Support:** Collaboration required for deep-learning model tuning, but automation of existing marketing operations is immediately achievable.
- **Potential AI Upskilling Areas:** Expansion into deep reinforcement learning for campaign optimization and autonomous budget allocation.

#### **🔹 Projected AI Impact on Rithum’s Marketing Operations**
- **Marketing Execution Efficiency:** 60-80% of marketing ops tasks automated with AI-first campaign execution.
- **Lead Qualification Accuracy:** 35-50% improvement in MQL-to-SQL conversion rates via AI-powered lead prioritization.
- **Operational Cost Savings:** Reduction in manual marketing workload equivalent to 1-2 full-time employees.
- **AI-Enhanced Reporting & Insights:** Elimination of static reporting, replaced with AI-generated real-time recommendations.

#### **🔹 90-Day AI Roadmap for Rithum**
🚀 **Phase 1 (Days 1-30): AI Readiness & Efficiency Gains**  
- Deploy AI-powered campaign execution in Marketo AI.  
- Automate CRM and lead scoring workflows.  
- Implement AI-driven real-time marketing analytics dashboards.  

🚀 **Phase 2 (Days 31-60): AI-Augmented Personalization & Predictive Targeting**  
- Launch AI-powered behavioral segmentation models.  
- Deploy AI-driven content personalization in outbound campaigns.  
- Optimize demand generation spend dynamically with AI insights.  

🚀 **Phase 3 (Days 61-90): Full AI-Powered Marketing Operations Optimization**  
- Implement reinforcement learning for campaign performance auto-adjustments.  
- Deploy NLP-powered email and landing page A/B testing automation.  
- Fully automate AI-based marketing attribution and spend optimization.  

---

### **Education & Certifications**
- B.S. Industrial Engineering – Purdue University
- AI & Data Science Certifications (Google Data Analytics, AI Strategy Courses)
- Marketo Certified Expert + Salesforce Einstein AI Specialization

---

### **Final Notes**
This resume fully aligns with the **AI-driven job automation approach for Rithum’s Global Marketing Automation Manager role**, demonstrating how I **not only perform this job but eliminate the need for it**. The AI Implementation Plan outlines **exactly how AI-first workflows can replace traditional marketing ops functions, reduce inefficiencies, and scale marketing execution**.

🔥 **This is the AI-Augmented Candidate Resume—redefining the hiring process for marketing automation.**"}]}
